unnormalised: Doc recommended getting a blood test done ASAP to rule out dengue or malaria; symptoms started showing around 3 days ago on 10/10 and its getting worse. Also, check with your GP regarding prophylaxis if you're planning to travel near coastal areas.
normalised: Doctor recommended getting a blood test done A-S-A-P to rule out dengue or malaria; symptoms started showing around three days ago on tenth october and its getting worse. Also, check with your G-P regarding prophylaxis if you're planning to travel near coastal areas.
